author: Support
title: A Journey of Resilience and Faith: Daybreak by Gwendolyn Leavell
text:
A Journey of Resilience and Faith: Daybreak by Gwendolyn Leavell
CHULA VISTA, CA, UNITED STATES, December 5, 2024 / EINPresswire.com / -- Author Gwendolyn Leavell introduces Daybreak , a powerful and inspiring story of survival, resilience, and spiritual faith amidst the trials of modern life.
In a world fraught with fear, danger, and uncertainty, Daybreak follows the journey of a single woman navigating the mental and emotional challenges of everyday life. Through her struggles and triumphs, the story shines a light on the strength that comes from faith and the courage to overcome life’s adversities.
Themes That Resonate
Resilience in Adversity: The protagonist’s journey mirrors the struggles many face in a world filled with unexpected challenges.
Spiritual Faith as a Beacon: Daybreak highlights how faith serves as a source of strength and guidance in the darkest moments.
Real-Life Reflection: This story captures the emotional and mental battles of living in a world where fear and uncertainty are constant companions.
Why Daybreak is a Must-Read
Leavell’s narrative is a compelling blend of heartfelt storytelling and profound insights, offering readers a chance to reflect on their own experiences and find hope in their faith.
About the Author
Gwendolyn Leavell is a gifted storyteller with a passion for exploring themes of faith, resilience, and personal growth. Her work speaks to the human spirit’s capacity to endure and triumph in the face of life’s greatest challenges.
Availability
Daybreak is now available in bookstores and online in print and e-book formats.
Contact Information
For interviews, review copies, or additional information, please contact:
www.pageturner.us
